author: WarperSan
name: Unity Mod Template
description: A project structure for doing Unity mods

UsePublicizer.description: Defines if the project uses the assembly publicizer.

UseLogger.description: Defines if the project includes a default logging implementation.

UseHarmony.description: Defines if the project includes a default patching implementation using Harmony.

Authors.description: Defines the authors of this project, adding their name in the credits.

Description.description: Defines the description of this project.
